title: 05/13/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/13/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin goes all in on the release of the NFL regular season schedule and why there are 2 teams that clearly benefitted from the structure of their schedule. He explains why all signs are showing you Aaron Rodgers will stay with the Packers despite all the offseason drama. He also tells us which QB in the NFC should already be in the MVP spotlight. Plus, National Champion and former Oklahoma head coach Bob Stoops joins the show to talk about joining the Big Noon Kickoff Crew and previewing the college football season. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
